code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{getPlaces}from'../API/placesaction';import'../styles/places.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Places=_ref=>{let{searchTerm}=_ref;const[places,setPlaces]=useState([]);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{getPlaces().then(data=>setPlaces(data)).catch(err=>setError(err));},[]);if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error.message]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:places.filter(place=>{if(searchTerm===""){return place;}else if(place.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())){return place;}return null;}).map(place=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:place.image,alt:place.name,className:"card-img-top"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:place.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:place.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/book/".concat(place.id),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Go Book"})]})]})},place.id))})});};export default Places;
